data.boring_theme: going to the petrol station to pump diesel into a vehicle
data.output: I was driving my petrol lawnmower whilst maintaining my 3 acres of fields. In a lapse of judgement I accidentally crashed into a water pump that irrigated the farm. Whilst the pump was being repaired, I had to hire a diesel generator to replace the pump.

data.boring_theme: putting a stamp on the envelop containing a letter to send it
data.output: Whilst marking my pupil's test scores, I use a different colour stamp based on their performance. If they have done well, the stamp is green. If they have done poorly, the stamp is red and I send the student to an after school revision class. To get permission for this, I must get a permission letter signed by their parents.

data.boring_theme: having an organ empire and complying with regulations
data.output: After the emperor fell ill, he desperately needed an organ transplant. Soldiers were ordered to scour the vast lands of his empire to find a suitable donor. Once found, they had no choice but to comply.

data.boring_theme: the feeling of gloom you have about an existing payment
data.output: A constant part of adult life is the doom and gloom portrayed on the news. However, happiness does exist and can come in many forms. From food, to time spent with loved ones, happiness does not always require payment to find.
